charaepi_ch0175_00_gojika/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] had been hearing a
lot about Olympia’s fortune-telling skills, so [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ]
went to experience them [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="himself" F="herself" ].
charaepi_ch0175_00_gojika/2301_1201_0300:
So I welcome you to my
fortune-telling hall, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0175_00_gojika/2301_1201_0400:
Do you wonder, child?
About Sigilyph’s movement.
charaepi_ch0175_00_gojika/2301_1201_0600:
From your point of view, what do you think
Sigilyph is doing right
now, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0175_00_gojika/2301_0401_0900: Sigilyph once watched over an ancient city.
charaepi_ch0175_00_gojika/2301_0401_1000:
It is possible that Sigilyph’s searching for
something like you
said, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0175_00_gojika/2301_0401_1100:
An ancient city may have been here long before
Pasio was built.
charaepi_ch0175_00_gojika/2301_0401_1200:
Or, at least, I think it’s a possibility. Wouldn’t
you agree?
charaepi_ch0175_00_gojika/2301_0302_1300: Is it feeling wary of something?
charaepi_ch0175_00_gojika/2301_0402_1500: Sigilyph strikes invaders with psychic power.
charaepi_ch0175_00_gojika/2301_0402_1600:
Or so it is said. Thus, I think what you have
guessed may just be
correct, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0175_00_gojika/2301_1201_1700:
Only Sigilyph can know what is truly on its mind,
however.
charaepi_ch0175_00_gojika/2301_1201_1800:
Just as we see here, there is more than one way
to look at anything.
charaepi_ch0175_00_gojika/2301_1201_1900:
Someone else may see the same thing you saw
and still view it differently,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0175_00_gojika/2301_1201_2000:
You yourself may have answered differently if
some small detail changed.
charaepi_ch0175_00_gojika/2301_1201_2500:
The meanings of messages written in our stars
are subject to change. It can all depend on the
interpretation.
charaepi_ch0175_00_gojika/2301_1201_2600:
Interpretations are neither correct or wrong. They
are what they are.
charaepi_ch0175_00_gojika/2301_1201_2700:
As for the future, it can be altered by what you
now choose to do.
charaepi_ch0175_00_gojika/2301_1201_2800:
Keep that in mind, child. Whatever I now foretell
that your future holds...
charaepi_ch0175_00_gojika/2301_1201_2900:
see from all angles. Every possibility. Find your
own true “now.”
charaepi_ch0175_00_gojika/2301_1201_3100:
Now, to know your fate, place your wrist in my
bracelet, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
